text: @CookTrainEatRce @MASlife My aunt is a retired pharmacist & she kept saying “the flu” when we were on the phone. I finally said, “if you’re going to call it something other than Covid, just call it SARS, because that’s more what it is.” Thankfully she wasn’t offended, but hello.. you’re a scientist. 🤦🏼‍♀️
